terms.definition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how limited were you in these activities because of your breathing problems: Daily activities at home?
terms.preferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Breathing Problems Limit Daily Activity

terms.definition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how limited were you in these activities because of your breathing problems: Moderate physical activities?
terms.preferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Breathing Problems Limit Moderate Activity

terms.definition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how limited were you in these activities because of your breathing problems: Social activities?
terms.preferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Breathing Problems Limit Social Activity

terms.definition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how limited were you in these activities because of your breathing problems: Strenuous physical activities?
terms.preferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Breathing Problems Limit Strenuous Activity

terms.definition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how often did you feel: Concerned about getting a cold or your breathing getting worse?
terms.preferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Concern About Breathing Get Worse

terms.definition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - In general, during the past 24 hours, how much of the time: Did you cough?
terms.preferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Did You Cough

terms.definition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how often did you feel: Depressed because of your breathing problems?
terms.preferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Depressed Because of Breathing Problem

terms.definition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - In general, during the past 24 hours, how much of the time: Did you produce sputum or phlegm?
terms.preferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Produce Sputum or Phlegm

terms.definition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how often did you feel: Short of breath while at rest?
terms.preferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Short of Breath at Rest

terms.definition: Clinical COPD Questionnaire 24 Hour Version - On average, during the past 24 hours, how often did you feel: Short of breath while doing physical activities?
terms.preferredTerm: CCQ 24 Hour Version - Short of Breath Doing Physical Activity
